fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Youth, Regional Policy, Communication
eu_initiatives:
YouthProAktiv is a global coalition of young people advocating for pro-activity and entrepreneurship friendly policies. We call for educational reform that would equip young people with professional and entrepreneurial skills necessary for the labor market. 
 
We work closely within the Committee of CULT, EMPL, ITRE, the Youth Intergroup and the EU40 group. 
 
We work closely with DG EACEA, GROW and CONNECT
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
- We are part of the European Alliance for Apprenticeship 
- Declaration of Young European on youth unemployment 
- Declaration of Young European on the second chance policy proposal 
- Participation on high level conferences organised by EC and related agencies. 
- Participation on Policy Learning Forums organised by EC 
- Representation of EU Delegation to the G7 Youth Summit 2017 
- Forbes List30under30 on Law& Policy 
- Organisations of different international conferences. 
- Declaration of Young European on work life balance
goals__remit: YOUTHPROAKTIV is an organization aiming at creating a generation of proactive individuals ready to invest their talents for the BETTERMENT OF SOCIETY by starting their own business and CREATING JOBS for themselves and others.
